sense.def:
A plague
je zelo nalezljiva bolezen, ki se hitro širi in zaradi katere umre veliko ljudi.

A plague of unpleasant things
je množica neprijetnih stvari, ki se dogajajo ali pridejo naenkrat.

Kadar neprijetne stvari
plague someone
, se nekomu kar naprej dogajajo in mu povzročajo veliko težav.

seg.quote: The system is plagued by technical faults.
He suffered severe back injuries, which plague him to this day.

sense.def:
To plague someone
pomeni nenehno nekoga motiti ali ga za nekaj prositi.

seg.quote: The readers were urged to plague their MP with letters of protest.
